alert.note: Alert for Grant; Natchitoches; Sabine; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 6:05AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Grant, Natchitoches, east central Sabine and southwestern Winn Parishes through 645 AM CDT... At 604 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Natchitoches to near Slagle. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Natchitoches, Campti, Montgomery, Provencal, Natchez, Clarence, Goldonna, Robeline, Powhatan, Kisatchie, Cloutierville, Melrose, Bellwood, Chopin, St. Maurice, Chestnut, Clear Lake, Gorum, Grand Ecore and Flora. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
